beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Dirty French breaks you. 100 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 15
beats.narration: Mile 15. The Farm Road Maze. Unmarked intersections and deteriorating gravel through working farmland. Miss a turn here and you'll add miles you can't afford to lose.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained climbs, technical terrain, challenging Ohio hill country

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 35
beats.narration: Mile 35. The Limestone Grinder. Sustained climbing on loose crushed stone that punishes every pedal stroke. Your tires will hunt for traction while the gradient slowly increases.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained climbs, technical terrain, challenging Ohio hill country

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 65
beats.narration: Mile 65. The False Summit Sequence. Three consecutive climbs that each promise to be the last big effort. They're all lying to you, and the third one is the steepest.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained climbs, technical terrain, challenging Ohio hill country

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 85
beats.narration: Mile 85. The Final Reckoning. When you think you're done climbing, Ohio serves up one more sustained grind. This is where undertrained riders discover their actual limits.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Appalachian foothills gravel - steep sustained climbs, technical terrain, challenging Ohio hill country

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 4 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).
